"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung oder kenntnis? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent or knowledge? #dataprotection #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and using personal data without users' consent or knowledge. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience interested in these topics. the use of german language and twitter-style format, including hashtags, is intended to make the post more relatable and accessible to a german-speaking audience active on social media platforms.
